list_definition.definition: to make a firm decision (to do something)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It was resolved that women should be allowed to join the society.

list_definition.definition: to take away (a doubt, fear etc) or produce an answer to (a problem, difficulty etc).
determination to do what one has decided to do

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It is his resolve to become a director of this firm.
